title: Mobile Suit Gundam Unicorn: Episode EX - 100 Years of Solitude
synopsis: Recap of Mobile Suit Gundam, Mobile Suit Zeta Gundam, Mobile Suit Gundam ZZ and Mobile Suit Gundam: Char's Counterattack focusing on Newtype and Zeonism ideals told before UC episode 7.
